Language.Text:
The Ares has asked you to test the Iocrym strengths and weaknesses by destroying one of their outposts.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

An Ares scientist comes forward:
"Welcome, Human! It is good that we can meet under peaceful circumstances. Like you, we are studying the Iocrym, for they are as much a threat to us as they are to you."

"Our forescouts have detected a hidden Iocrym outpost inside the quarantine zone. We ask that you destroy it so that we may understand its strengths and weaknesses. Do you wish to accept this request?"

"You are strong, Human! We will repay your efforts by sharing all data that we collect.
"On Ares we would say, 'May you find water,' but in your honor, Human, we say 'Good luck'"
"Your weakness discredits your race! Return later if you wish to reclaim your honor."
Language.String: "Human! What are you doing here? Your task is out in deep space!"
Language.Text:
"Good fortune, Human! Based on your encounter with the Iocrym outpost we have analyzed their defenses. Although their technology is far beyond ours, they are not invincible. They are particularly vulnerable to antimatter weapons.
"As promised, here is a ROM that contains the data we've gathered."

An Ares scientist comes forward:
"Welcome, Human! We are studying the Iocrym just as you are now. Return here when your task is complete and perhaps we can help each other."
